work.summary: I was in charge of developing and maintaining several solutions, the main one being the TimbraXML billing web application. Besides gaining a lot of knowledge of frontend and backend web development, I learned what is a good workflow among a development team, supported by version control tools, progression boards and effective communication channels.
highlights: Turning repetitive processes into documented libraries.
Promoting the use of modern and more readable .syntax

work.summary: Originally tasked to be an assistant in technical support and server administration, I ended up doing all the engineering process to develop an Android application. During the time I was providing support, I learned to gather and interpret information about the experience of using software by users with little or no computer knowledge. During the development of the application I learned about modern software design architectures (MVVM and observer pattern), how to reverse engineer an existing system to integrate it to another with zero documentation, how to implement a REST API with PHP and Laravel, as well as how to secure the requests to the server through JSON Web Tokens.

Member of the development team and mentored by Felix Amaya Valencia, from whom I quickly gained recognition and was assigned tasks of the same weight as those given to permanent members of the team. I was responsible for designing several modules of the ERP system and some sections of the company's database. Working there taught me to have a larger scale vision of a system and to understand the importance of knowing a problem in depth before writing even one line of code trying to solve it.

awards.title: 3rd place in HackSureste 2018
awards.summary: Awarded third place for creating a high-impact innovation project. It consists of a system to deliver restaurant orders directly from the diner to the kitchen through voice commands.

publications.name: Costeapp
publications.summary: Web application wrote in React capable of running offline that allows costing of cooking recipes.

publications.name: Asset validation application
publications.summary: Android application to validate the existence of fixed assets with a QR code.

publications.name: FiestasMexicanas
publications.summary: A system for quoting, order management and piñata production.
